name: 天火(TianHuo)
description:
This Is A Puzzle Game

It's A Time-travel story


Chinese wind? Martial arts? Little sister? All of them.
Remember, you only have 10 days to solve all the puzzles, otherwise...

Existing Game Features

1: Super Refreshing Sanxiao Game

2. Creative Chicken Eating Pattern

3: Super Innovative Half Turn Combat

4. Relaxed and comfortable mode of raising chickens

5: Happy Fishing Function

6: N Head Complete, Comfortable Bgm


This is a very casual game, I hope you can bring a comfortable.
